stories.title: [SPIKE] Animation Performance Prototype
stories.description: Evaluate React Native Skia vs. Reanimated for handling 78 concurrent card sprites.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN a test environment, WHEN 78 sprite elements are rendered, THEN the system maintains 60fps.
GIVEN the prototype, WHEN run on iOS and Android, THEN a benchmark report is generated comparing Skia vs Reanimated.

stories.title: Virtual Deck State Engine (Logic Only)
stories.description: As a developer, I want a deterministic data structure for the deck so that the simulation is preserved across app restarts.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN the app starts, WHEN the deck is initialized, THEN it contains exactly 78 card objects with unique IDs.
GIVEN a deck, WHEN the shuffle function is called, THEN the order is randomized using the Fisher-Yates algorithm.
GIVEN the app is closed, WHEN it is reopened, THEN the deck order persists via local storage.

stories.title: Design System & Thematic Engine
stories.description: As a UI Designer, I need a centralized system that supports 'Thematic Progression' (shifting colors based on session phase).
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN the design repository, WHEN accessed, THEN it contains defined Typography and Color Palettes.
GIVEN the app state changes (e.g., Light to Dark), WHEN the ThemeContext is updated, THEN the colors interpolate smoothly.
GIVEN the assets folder, WHEN checked, THEN it contains high-res card images.

stories.title: LLM Chat Interface & Prompt System
stories.description: As a Seeker, I want to chat with the AI to refine my intent. Tech Note: Requires a structured prompt system and STREAMING response handling.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN the chat interface, WHEN the user opens it, THEN suggestion bubbles (Quick Chips) are displayed.
GIVEN a vague user input, WHEN processed, THEN the system asks clarifying questions (Reasoning Chain).
GIVEN an LLM response, WHEN it is received, THEN it streams token-by-token to the UI within 1.5s.
GIVEN the user is typing, WHEN waiting for a response, THEN 'mystical' typing indicators are shown.

stories.title: Interactive Deck Renderer & Transitions
stories.description: As a user, I want smooth 60fps animations and a fluid transition from Chat to Table.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN the user moves from Chat to Deck View, WHEN the transition occurs, THEN it morphs seamlessly without loading spinners.
GIVEN a card is moved, WHEN the user drags it, THEN it follows the finger using React Native Reanimated.
GIVEN a card interaction, WHEN it ticks or drops, THEN the specific haptic feedback profile plays.

stories.title: Card Reveal & Interpretation
stories.description: As a user, I want to flip cards to see their meaning and get a synthesized final answer.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN a card face down, WHEN tapped, THEN it flips with a 3D rotation.
GIVEN a card is revealed, WHEN the animation plays, THEN a 'Magical' particle effect is triggered.
GIVEN specific cards are drawn, WHEN the reading concludes, THEN the LLM generates a 'Macro' synthesis linking them to the query.

stories.title: Local Data Privacy & Obfuscation
stories.description: As a skeptical user, I want my personal queries to be stored securely.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN user chat history, WHEN stored locally, THEN it is encrypted.
GIVEN an API call to the LLM, WHEN sent, THEN it does not include a persistent user ID unless necessary.
GIVEN the settings menu, WHEN 'Delete History' is pressed, THEN all local data is removed.

stories.title: Hybrid Authentication Flow
stories.description: As a new user, I want to try a reading without signing up immediately.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN a new user, WHEN they open the app, THEN they can start a 'Guest' session.
GIVEN a completed reading, WHEN the user wants to save history, THEN they are prompted for Sign-up/OAuth.
GIVEN a guest account, WHEN an account is created, THEN the guest data is merged.
